metadata.title: CVE-2023-46814 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: A binary hijacking vulnerability exists within the VideoLAN VLC mediaplayer before 3.0.19 on Windows. The uninstaller attempts to execute codewith elevated privileges out of a standard user writable location. Standardusers may use this to gain arbitrary code execution as SYSTEM.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
